barker_notes.barker_summary: Asking a conference. Important to decide something definite concerning Santa Anna
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: From the Lamar Papers, Texas State Library. The letter is addressed to Lamar at Mrs. Long's, Brazoria.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 377

div1.p: Asking a conference. Important to decide something definite concerning Santa Anna

I very much wish you would come to the house tonight or early tomorrow morning. It will not be much out of the way. I think it very important that something definite should be determined upon as to Santa Anna, as soon as you reach the army yours respectfully
